Simple Report
--

Plot of some Random Data
```{r, echo = F, results = 'hide', fig.align = 'center'}

plt <- dygraph(DT)

if (styled){
  
  plt <- plt %>% 
    dySeries(name = 'signal_1', label = 'Signal 1', color = '#FE00FF', drawPoints = T) %>%
    dySeries(name = 'signal_2', label = 'Signal 2', color = '#FFFF00', drawPoints = T)
  
}

```
